name: Clustered Heatmap
description: Calculate the mathematical average of the data points in a cell.

properties.name: Cluster Rows
properties.description: Whether or not the rows should be clustered.

properties.name: Cluster Columns
properties.description: Whether or not the columns should be clustered.

properties.name: Display Legend
properties.description: Whether the legend should be drawn or not.

properties.name: Scale
properties.description: Indicates if the values should be centered and scaled in either the row direction or the column direction, or none.

properties.name: Show Row Names
properties.description: Whether to display row names or not.

properties.name: Show Column Names
properties.description: Whether to display column names or not.

properties.name: Show Row Factors
properties.description: Whether to display row factors or not.

properties.name: Show Column Factors
properties.description: Whether to display column factors or not.
